solution_line_template: The garden produced {cucumbers} cucumbers * {peppers_per_cucumber} peppers/cucumber = <<{cucumbers}*{peppers_per_cucumber}={peppers}>>{peppers} peppers.
The garden produced {potatoes} potatoes + {cucumbers} cucumbers + {peppers} peppers = <<{potatoes}+{cucumbers}+{peppers}={total_vegetables}>>{total_vegetables} vegetables.
